extendedInfo.description: Want to know if they tell the truth. Here you can see they do not tell lies.This application simulates a fingerprint detected by the force exerted and detects if they tell the truth or tell lies.Play with your friends with this application to detect if you tell lies or truths.How it works:Place your finger on the screen fingerprint and detect if they tell the truth or not.Warning:This application is to play, it is not really a polygraph detecting truths. It realemnte you to play with your friends or family.
